original_text: And as soon as he heard that I lifted up my voice and cried out, he left his garment beside me and fled and got out of the house.”
korean_text: 그가 나의 소리 질러 부름을 듣고 그의 옷을 내게 버려두고 도망하여 나갔느니라 하고

sentences.original_text: And as soon as he heard
that I lifted up my voice and cried out
he left his garment beside me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 겉옷을 내 곁에 두고

sentences.original_text: and fled and got out of the house
